ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] hi
ygData.msgSnippet: hi guys, i believe my shammy would win over her necro. due to the fact that i can root her, give myself regen, and dot her with a crap load of dot and poison
ygData.messageBody:
hi guys,

i believe my shammy would win over her necro. due to
the fact that i can root her, give myself regen, and
dot her with a crap load of dot and poison spells.
plus our pets can duel it out while i watch her die
ever so slowly.
Qbano Boofmiester
Druzzil Ro
--- Jamie that is called Jamie
